INSOMNEA art

Patched Up

Patched Up is a story based horror adventure with dark topics but a happy ending. You follow the story of a bunny girl named Anne who fell into a toy world, trying to find her stuffed bunny. The game progresses through different chapters and contains puzzles to solve in order to proceed.br>
This project was created in a module during my studies in 2024. We worked in a team of one programmer and three designers to create a vertical slice within one semester, which we then pitched to Julia Kenny from the publisher Headup Games.

My contributions to this project:

  • Game design lead & creative direction
  • Level design
  • Storyborading
  • Writing
  • Creating 3D assets
  • Character concept art
  • UI
  • Preparing the pitchdeck

Our vertical slice/demo was even nominated for the PAX Talent Award 2025 and is currently downloadable on itch.io.

For our vertical slice I created various 3D assets in Blender and Substance Painter and imported them in Unity.

The level for our vertical slice consisted of a dollhouse, which I made a rough blockout map in Miro for.

The story board I made in Rebelle Painter Pro consists of the beginning of the game where Anne falls into the toy world as the part in the dollhouse. This is the section we implemented.

I created parts of the UI in photoshop. This includes the menuscreen (shown here as a mockshot) and the game instructions for a potential exhibition of the student project at Fantasy Basel.
